ModMetaData.name: TF2 Weapons
ModMetaData.author: Engineer 2.4
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a lot of TF2 weapons. Will be adding as many as I can.
I haven't played this game enough to know balancing for mods so any ideas to make it better would be nice.
TODO: add textures for projectiles. more weapons. shields. sentry and dispensers. Dispensers will work like a medical bed but way slower healing rate. I don't know how i will make it but i will
